article.paragraph: Adobe Systems Incorporatedis an AmericanMultinational corporationmultinationalcomputer software company. The company is headquartered inSan Jose, CaliforniaSan Jose, California, United States. Adobe has historically focused upon the creation of multimedia and creativity software products, with a more-recent foray towardsrich Internet applicationsoftware development. It is best known forPhotoshop, thePortable Document Format(PDF) andAdobe Creative Suite, as well as its successorAdobe Creative Cloud.

Adobe was founded in February 1982cite webhttps://www.adobe.com/aboutadobe/pressroom/pdfs/fastfacts.pdfAdobe Fast FactsMarch 9, 2009April 4, 2009PDFhttps://web.archive.org/web/20090326033602/http://www.adobe.com/aboutadobe/pressroom/pdfs/fastfacts.pdf26 March 2009nobyJohn WarnockandCharles Geschke, who established the company after leavingXerox PARCin order to develop and sell thePostScriptpage description language. In 1985,Apple Inc.Apple Computerlicensed PostScript for use in itsLaserWritercomputer printerprinters, which helped spark thedesktop publishingrevolution.cite webhttp://www.macworld.com/article/1150845/laserwriter.htmlFour reasons the LaserWriter matteredEdwardsBenjApril 27, 2010MacWorldSeptember 24, 2015

as of2015, Adobe Systems has about 13,500 employees,about 40% of whom work in San Jose. Adobe also has major development operations inNewton, MassachusettsNewton, Massachusetts;New York City, New YorkNew York City, New York;Orlando, FloridaOrlando, Florida;Minneapolis, Minnesota;Lehi, UtahLehi, Utah;Seattle, Washington;San FranciscoandSan Luis Obispo, CaliforniaSan Luis Obispo, California in the United States.
article.heading: History
article.paragraph: The name of the company,Adobe, comes fromAdobe Creek (near Los Altos)Adobe CreekinLos Altos, CaliforniaLos Altos, California, which ran behind the houses of both of the company's founders.Adobe's corporate logo features a stylized "A" and was designed by the wife ofJohn Warnock, Marva Warnock, who is a graphic designer.cite webhttp://www.famouslogos.net/adobe-logo/Adobe Logo: Design and HistoryFamouslogos.netJuly 28, 2011

Adobe's first products afterPostScriptweredigital fonts, which they released in a proprietary format calledType 1 fontType 1.Apple Inc.Applesubsequently developed a competing standard,TrueType, which provided full scalability and precise control of thepixelpattern created by the font's outlines, and licensed it toMicrosoft. Adobe responded by publishing the Type 1 specification and releasingAdobe Type Manager, software that allowedWYSIWYGscaling of Type 1 fonts on screen - like TrueType without the precise pixel-level control.Citation neededAugust 2014But these moves were too late to stop the rise of TrueType. Although Type 1 remained the standard in the graphics/publishing market, TrueType became the standard for business and the average Windows user. In 1996, Adobe and Microsoft announced theOpenTypefont format, and in 2003 Adobe completed converting its Type 1 font library to OpenType.Citation neededAugust 2014

In the mid-1980s, Adobe entered the consumerComputer softwaresoftwaremarket withAdobe Illustrator, avector graphicsvector-based drawing program for theApple Macintosh. Illustrator, which grew from the firm's in-house font-development software, helped popularize PostScript-enabled laser printers. UnlikeMacDraw, the then standard Macintosh vector drawing program, Illustrator described shapes with more flexibleBzier curves, providing unprecedented accuracy.Citation neededAugust 2014Font rendering in Illustrator, however, was left to the Macintosh'sQuickDrawlibraries and would not be superseded by a PostScript-like approach until Adobe released Adobe Type Manager.Citation neededAugust 2014

Adobe Systems enteredNASDAQin 1986. Its revenue has grown from roughly $1 billion in 1999 to roughly $4 billion in 2012.cite webhttp://finance.google.com/finance?qGoogle FinanceAdobe Systems Incorporated Company ProfileAdobe's fiscal years run from December to November. For example, the 2007 fiscal year ended on November 30, 2007.

In 1989, Adobe introduced what was to become itsflagshipproduct, a graphics editing program for the Macintosh calledAdobe PhotoshopPhotoshop. Stable and full-featured, Photoshop 1.0 was ably marketed by Adobe and soon dominated the market.cite webhttp://www.siliconuser.com/?qHow Adobe's Photoshop Was BornJune 12, 2007HormbyThomas[[SiliconUser]]https://web.archive.org/web/20070611134528/http://siliconuser.com/?q11 June 2007no

In 1993, Adobe introducedPDF, the Portable Document Format, and itsAdobe acrobatAdobe Acrobat and Readersoftware. PDF is now an International Standard:PDFISO 32000-1:2008. The technology is adopted worldwide as a common medium for electronic documents.Citation neededAugust 2014

In December 1991, Adobe released Adobe Premiere, which Adobe rebranded toAdobe Premiere Proin 2003. In 1994, Adobe acquiredAldusand addedAdobe PageMakerandAdobe After Effectsto its product line later in the year; it also controls theTIFFfile format. In 1995, Adobe addedAdobe FrameMaker, the long-document DTP application, to its product line after Adobe acquired Frame Technology Corp. In 1996, Adobe Systems Inc addedAresSoftware Corp.cite webhttp://www.highbeam.com/doc/1G1-18422328.htmlAdobe gets font technology. (Adobe Systems Inc. acquires Ares Software Corp.)June 3, 1996Jul 12, 2013In 1999, Adobe introducedAdobe InCopyas a direct competitor to QuarkCopyDesk.Citation neededAugust 2014

File:Adobesystemsottawa.jpgrightthumbAdobe Systems Canada in Ottawa, Ontario (not far from archrivalCorel).In1992, Adobe acquired OCR Systems, Inc.; in 1994, the company acquiredAldusAldus Corporation. On May 30, 1997, Adobe reincorporated in Delaware by merging with and into Adobe Systems (Delaware), which had incorporated on May 9, 1997. Adobe Systems Incorporated (Delaware), the surviving corporation, changed its name to Adobe Systems Incorporated concurrently with the merger.Citation neededAugust 2014

The company acquired GoLive Systems, Inc. and releasedAdobe GoLivein 1999 and began shippingAdobe InDesignas a direct competitor toQuarkXPressand as an eventual replacement forPageMaker. In May 2003, Adobe acquired Syntrillium Software, addingAdobe Auditionto its product line. In December 2004, French company OKYZ S.A., makers of 3D collaboration software, was acquired. This acquisition added 3D technology and expertise to the Adobe Intelligent Document Platform.Citation neededAugust 2014

On December 12, 2005, Adobe acquired its main rivalMacromediain astock swapvalued at about $3.4 billion, addingAdobe ColdFusion,Adobe Contribute,Adobe Captivate,Adobe Acrobat Connect(formerly Macromedia Breeze),Adobe Director,Adobe Dreamweaver,Adobe Fireworks,Adobe Flash,FlashPaper,Adobe Flex,Adobe FreeHand,Adobe HomeSite,Adobe JRun,Adobe Presenter, andAdobe Authorwareto Adobe's product line.cite newsJeffersonGrahamAdobe buys Macromedia in $3.4B dealhttp://www.usatoday.com/money/industries/technology/2005-04-18-adobe-macromedia_x.htm?cspUSA TodayApril 18, 2005March 31, 2007

On November 12, 2007, CEO,Bruce Chizenresigned. Effective December 1, he was replaced byShantanu Narayen, Adobe's current president and Chief Operating Officer. Bruce Chizen served out his term on Adobe's Board of Directors, and then continued in a strategic advisory role until the end of Adobe's 2008fiscal year.Citation neededAugust 2014

Adobe released Adobe Media Player in April 2008. On April 27, Adobe discontinued development and sales of its older HTML/web development software,Adobe GoLiveGoLivein favor ofAdobe DreamweaverDreamweaver. Adobe offered a discount on Dreamweaver for GoLive users and supports those who still use GoLive with online tutorials and migration assistance. On June 1, Adobe launchedAcrobat.com, a series ofweb applicationsgeared for collaborative work.cite webhttp://blogs.adobe.com/acom/2008/06/welcome_to_acrobatcom_work_tog_1.htmlWelcome to Acrobat.com – Work. Together. Anywhere.June 1, 2008June 2, 2008AdobeErikLarsonhttps://web.archive.org/web/20080603155243/http://blogs.adobe.com/acom/2008/06/welcome_to_acrobatcom_work_tog_1.html3 June 2008noCreative Suite 4, which includes Design, Web, Production Premium and Master Collection came out in October 2008 in six configurations at prices from about USD $1,700 to $2,500cite newsAdobe launches Creative Suite 4; Likely to top low expectationshttp://blogs.zdnet.com/BTL/?pSeptember 23, 2008ZDNetCBSSeptember 23, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080924141406/http://blogs.zdnet.com/BTL/?p24 September 2008noor by individual application.The Windows version of Photoshop includes 64-bit processing.cite newsCarlson, JeffAdobe Announces Vast Creative Suite 4http://db.tidbits.com/article/9782September 23, 2008TidBITSSeptember 23, 2008https://web.archive.org/web/20080928100028/http://db.tidbits.com/article/978228 September 2008noOn December 3, 2008, Adobe laid off 600 of its employees (8% of the worldwide staff) citing theLate 2000s recessionweak economic environment.

Adobe announced two acquisitions in 2009: on August 29, it purchasedBusiness Catalyst,Citation neededAugust 2014and on September 15, it boughtOmniture.Citation neededAugust 2014On November 10, the company laid off 680 employees.cite newsMorrisonScotthttp://online.wsj.com/article/SB10001424052748704402404574528174100385780.htmlAdobe Will Cut 680 Jobs to Reduce CostsWall Street JournalNovember 10, 2009November 9, 2010Adobe announced it was investigating a "Operation Auroracoordinated attack" against corporate network systems in China, managed by the company.cite webhttp://www.dailytech.com/Adobe%20Targeted%20by%20Cyber%20Attack%20from%20China/article17387.htmAdobe Targeted by Cyber Attack from ChinaDailyTechMay 29, 2010https://web.archive.org/web/20100525075211/http://www.dailytech.com/Adobe+Targeted+by+Cyber+Attack+from+China/article17387.htm25 May 2010no

Adobe's 2010 was marked by continuing front-and-back arguments with Apple over the latter's non-support for Adobe Flash on its iPhone, iPad and other products.cite webhttp://www.networkworld.com/news/2010/060710-tech-argument-apple-adobe.htmlApple vs. Adobenetworkworld.comJune 7, 2010July 28, 2011https://web.archive.org/web/20110613123134/http://www.networkworld.com/news/2010/060710-tech-argument-apple-adobe.html13 June 2011noApple CEO Steve Jobs claimed that Flash was not reliable or secure enough, while Adobe executives have argued that Apple wish to maintain control over the iOS platform. In April 2010, Steve Jobs published a post titled "Thoughts on Flash" where he outlined his thoughts onAdobe Flashand the rise ofHTML 5.cite web[[Apple Inc.|Apple]]http://www.apple.com/hotnews/thoughts-on-flash/Thoughts on Flash2012-07-10In July 2010, Adobe boughtDay Softwarecite webhttp://www.cmswire.com/cms/web-cms/web-cms-adobe-buys-day-software-for-us-240-million-008168.phpAdobe Buys Day SoftwareJuly 28, 2010January 16, 2012integrating their line of CQ Products: WCM,cite webhttp://www.day.com/day/en/products/web_content_management.htmlAdobe CQ WEMFebruary 22, 2011January 16, 2012DAM,cite webhttp://www.day.com/day/en/products/digital_asset_management.htmlAdobe CQ DAMFebruary 22, 2011January 16, 2012SOCO,cite webhttp://www.day.com/day/en/products/social_collaboration.htmlAdobe CQ Social Collaboration CQ SOCOFebruary 22, 2011January 16, 2012and Mobilecite webhttp://www.day.com/day/en/products/mobile.htmlAdobe CQ MobileFebruary 22, 2011January 16, 2012

In January 2011, Adobe acquired DemDex, Inc. with the intent of adding DemDex's audience-optimization software to its online marketing suite.cite webhttp://techcrunch.com/2011/01/18/adobe-buys-behavioral-data-management-platform-demdex/Adobe Buys Behavioral Data Management Platform DemDexLeena RaoJanuary 18, 2011TechCrunch20 April 2015At Photoshop World 2011, Adobe unveiled a new mobile photo service.Darrell Etherington, GigaOm. "Adobe tries mobile photos as a service with Carousel." September 7, 2011. Retrieved September 12, 2011.Carousel is a new application for iPhone, iPad and Mac that uses Photoshop Lightroom technology for users to adjust and fine-tune images on all platforms.Carousel will also allow users to automatically sync, share and browse photos.The service was later renamed to "Adobe Revel".John Nack on Adobe: Adobe Carousel renamed "Adobe Revel". Blogs.adobe.com (2012-01-11). Retrieved on 2013-07-21.On November 9, 2011, Adobe announced that they would cease development of Flash for mobile devices following version 11.1. Instead it would focus on HTML 5 for mobile devices.cite webWinokurDannyhttp://blogs.adobe.com/conversations/2011/11/flash-focus.htmlFlash to Focus on PC Browsing and Mobile Apps; Adobe to More Aggressively Contribute to HTML5 (Adobe Featured Blogs)Blogs.adobe.comNovember 9, 2011December 24, 2011On December 1, 2011, Adobe announced that it entered into a definitive agreement to acquire privately heldEfficient Frontier (company)Efficient Frontier.cite webhttp://www.pcworld.com/businesscenter/article/245198/adobe_buys_efficient_frontier_to_boost_its_online_advertising_capabilities.htmlAdobe Buys Efficient Frontier to Boost Its Online Advertising CapabilitiesDecember 1, 2011

In December 2012, Adobe opened a new 280,000 square foot corporate campus inLehi, UT.cite newsLeeJasenA look inside Adobe's new state-of-the-art Utah homehttp://www.deseretnews.com/article/865568252/A-look-inside-Adobes-new-state-of-the-art-Utah-home.html?pgDeseret NewsDec 6, 2012

anchorsecurity breachIn 2013, Adobe Systems endured a major security breach. Vast portions of the source code for the company's software were stolen and posted onlinecite webAdobe hack much worse than reported, hits 38 million passwords and Photoshop source codeThe Vergehttp://www.theverge.com/2013/10/29/5042434/adobe-cyberattack-takes-38-million-passwords-photoshop-source-codeand over 150 million records of Adobe's customers have been made readily available for download.cite webhttp://www.theverge.com/2013/11/7/5078560/over-150-million-breached-records-from-adobe-hack-surface-onlineOver 150 million breached records from Adobe hack have surfaced online.The VergeIn 2012, about 40 million sets of payment card information were compromised by a hack of Adobe.Skimming Off the Top; Why America has such a hiugh rate of payment-card fraud, 15 February 2014, The Economist

Aclass-action lawsuitalleging that the company suppressed employee compensation wasHigh-Tech Employee Antitrust Litigationfiled against Adobe, and three otherSilicon Valley-based companies in aCaliforniafederal district court in 2013.cite newshttp://online.wsj.com/article/BT-CO-20131025-706737.htmlJudge Grants Class-Action Status in Silicon Valley Hiring Suit - WSJ.comOnline.wsj.com2013-10-252013-10-30yeshttps://web.archive.org/20131029194810/http://online.wsj.com/article/BT-CO-20131025-706737.htmlOctober 29, 2013In May 2014, it was revealed the four companies, Adobe,Apple Inc.Apple,Google, andIntelhad reached agreement with the plaintiffs, 64,000 employees of the four companies, to pay a sum of $324.5 million to settle the suit.
article.heading: Products

list.listitem: Adobe Photoshop,Adobe Lightroom,Adobe InDesign,Adobe Illustrator,Adobe Fireworks,Adobe Soundbooth,Adobe AcrobatandAdobe Audition
Adobe ColdFusion,Adobe Content ServerandAdobe LiveCycleAdobe LiveCycle Enterprise Suite,Adobe BlazeDS

Portable Document Format(PDF), PDF's predecessorPostScript,ActionScript, Shockwave Flash (SWF),Flash Video(FLV), andFilmstrip(.flm)cite webhttp://www.compuphase.com/filmstrp.htmThe Filmstrip file format2012-07-02Thiadmer Riemersma2015-01-27CompuPhase
Adobe Dreamweaver,Adobe Contribute,Adobe Muse,Adobe Flash Builder,Adobe Flash Catalyst,Adobe Flash, andAdobe Edge
Adobe Premiere Pro,Adobe After Effects,Adobe Prelude, and Adobe SpeedGrade

article.heading: Reception
article.paragraph: For years hackers have exploited vulnerabilities in Adobe programs, such as Adobe Reader, to gain unauthorized access to computers.cite newsPaglieryJosehttp://money.cnn.com/2013/10/08/technology/security/adobe-security/Adobe has an espically abysmal security record - CNNMoneyMoney.cnn.com2013-10-082014-05-23Adobe's Flash Player has also been criticized for, among other things, suffering from performance, memory usage and security problems (seeFlash player#Criticismcriticism of Flash Player). A report by security researchers fromKaspersky Labcriticized Adobe for producing the products having top 10 security vulnerabilities.cite webAug 17, 2011 by Jeff James in Security Bloghttp://windowsitpro.com/blog/adobe-fares-poorly-kaspersky-lab-security-reportAdobe Fares Poorly in Kaspersky Lab Security ReportWindowsITPro2011-08-172014-05-23

Observers noted that Adobe was spying on its customers by includingspywarein the Creative Suite 3 software and quietly sending user data to a firm namedOmniture.cite webhttp://www.techdirt.com/articles/20071228/020818.shtmlAdobe Spying On Its CustomersTechdirt2007-12-282014-05-23When users became aware, Adobe explained what the suspicious software did and admitted that they: "could and should do a better job taking security concerns into account".cite webhttp://blogs.adobe.com/jnack/2007/12/adobe_ate_me_baby.htmlJohn Nack on Adobe: Adobe ate me baby!!Blogs.adobe.com2007-12-282014-05-23When a security flaw was later discovered in Photoshop CS5, Adobe sparked outrage by saying it would leave the flaw unpatched, so anyone who wanted to use the software securely would have to pay for an upgrade.cite webLoginhttp://www.techweekeurope.co.uk/news/adobe-creative-suite-patch-backtrac-77760Adobe Backtracks On Patching ‘PR Disaster’TechWeekEurope2012-05-142014-05-23Following a fierce backlash Adobe decided to provide the software patch.cite webBrennerBillhttp://blogs.csoonline.com/data-protection/2178/was-stupid-adobeThat was stupid, Adobe | CSO BlogsBlogs.csoonline.com2012-05-142014-05-23

Adobe has been criticized for pushing unwanted software including third-party browser toolbars and free virus scanners, usually as part of theAdobe FlashFlashupdate process,cite webhttp://www.zdnet.com/blog/bott/adobe-and-skype-top-my-foistware-hall-of-shame/3195Adobe and Skype top my Foistware Hall of ShameZDNet2011-04-282014-05-23and for pushing a third-partyscarewareprogram designed to scare users into paying for unneeded system repairs.cite webhttp://www.zdnet.com/blog/bott/adobes-latest-critical-security-update-pushes-scareware/4681Adobe's latest critical security update pushes scarewareZDNet2012-03-292014-05-23
article.heading: Awards
article.paragraph: Since 1995,Fortune (magazine)Fortunehas ranked Adobe as an outstanding place to work. Adobe was rated the 5th best U.S. company to work for in 2003, 6th in 2004, 31st in 2007, 40th in 2008, 11th in 2009, 42nd in 2010, 65th in 2011, 41st in 2012, and 83rd in 2013.cite newshttp://money.cnn.com/magazines/fortune/bestcompanies/2009/full_list/100 Best Companies to Work For 2009CNNIn 2015, Adobe Systems India was ranked 21st of great places to work in India.cite webhttp://www.greatplacetowork.in/best-companies/indias-best-companies-to-work-forBest Places to work in IndiaIn June 2014, it was ranked 6th of great places to work in India.,cite webhttp://www.greatplacetowork.in/best-companies/indias-best-companies-to-work-forBest Places to work in India by Economic timesIn October 2008, Adobe Systems Canada Inc. was named one of "Canada's Top 100 Employers" by Mediacorp Canada Inc., and was featured inMaclean'snewsmagazine.cite webhttp://www.eluta.ca/top-employer-adobe-systems-canadaReasons for Selection, 2009 Canada's Top 100 Employers Competition

Adobe ranked no. 5 on a list ofInternets 9 Most Hated Companies, based on a 2013 survey onReddit.com.cite web08.20.13http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2013/08/20/the-internet-s-9-most-hated-companies.htmlThe Internet’s 9 Most Hated Companies - The Daily Beast | BusinessThe Daily Beast2014-05-23Adobe'sAdobe ReaderReaderandAdobe FlashFlashwere listed onThe 10 most hated programs of all timeonTechRadar.com.cite webGary Marshall http://www.techradar.com/news/software/applications/the-10-most-hated-programs-of-all-time-1060129The 10 most hated programs of all time: Terrible software that made everybody see redTechRadar2014-05-23
article.heading: Pricing
article.paragraph: Adobe has been criticized for its pricing practices,cite webhttp://news.zdnet.co.uk/software/0,1000000121,39497760,00.htm?rAdobe responds to CS4 pricing criticismcite webhttp://www.builderau.com.au/news/soa/Adobe-defends-CS4-pricing/0,339028227,339292472,00.htmAdobe defends CS4 pricingwith retail prices being as much as twice as high in non-US countries as in the US.cite webhttp://www.creativepro.com/article/creative-suite-pricing-varies-throughout-worldAdobe responds to customer protests against perceived unfair pricing.As pointed out by many, it is significantly cheaper to pay for a return airfare ticket to the United States and purchase one particular collection of Adobe's software there than to buy it locally in Australia.cite webhttp://www.gizmodo.com.au/2013/02/dont-believe-the-adobe-price-cut-hype-its-still-gauging-you-silly/Don’t Believe The Adobe Price Cut Hype, It’s Still Gouging You SillyGizmodocite newshttp://www.theage.com.au/technology/technology-news/adobe-has-its-head-in-the-clouds-over-pricing-20130215-2ehat.htmlAdobe has its head in the clouds over pricingThe Age - TechnologyMelbourne

After Adobe revealed the pricing for the Creative Suite 3 Master Collection, which was 1,000 higher for European customers,cite webhttp://www.zdnet.com/uk-will-pay-1000-more-for-adobe-cs3-3039286561/UK will pay £1,000 more for Adobe CS3ZDNet2007-03-302014-05-23a petition to protest over "unfair pricing" was published and signed by 10,000 users.cite webhttp://photo.net/photography-news-forum/00LDbS10,000 sign Adobe CS3 European pricing petitionPhoto.net2007-05-202014-05-23In June 2009, Adobe further increased its prices in the UK by 10% in spite of weakening of the pound against the dollar,cite webhttp://www.pcpro.co.uk/news/254173/adobe-hikes-uk-prices-by-10.htmlAdobe hikes UK prices by 10% | NewsPC ProJune 1, 2009May 29, 2010and UK users are not allowed to buy from the US store.cite newsCharles Arthurhttp://www.guardian.co.uk/technology/2009/jun/04/adobe-softwareAdobe widens the price gapThe GuardianJune 3, 20092014-05-23London
article.heading: Source code and customer data breach
article.paragraph: On October 3, 2013, the company initially revealed that 2.9 million customers' sensitive and personal data was stolen in security breach which included encrypted credit card information.cite newshttp://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-24392819Adobe in source code and customer data security breachBBC2013-10-042014-05-23cite webAdobe accounts hacked, data exposed for 2.9 million customers - Digital Photography Reviewhttp://www.dpreview.com/news/2013/10/03/adobe-accounts-hacked-data-exposed-for-2-9-million-customerscite webKingRachelhttp://news.cnet.com/8301-1009_3-57605962-83/adobe-hacked-3-million-accounts-compromised/Adobe hacked, 3 million accounts compromised | Security & Privacy - CNET NewsAdobe later admitted that 38 million active users have been affected and the attackers obtained access to their IDs and encrypted passwords, as well as to many inactive Adobe accounts.cite webhttp://news.cnet.com/8301-1009_3-57609753-83/adobe-hack-attack-affected-38-million-accounts/Adobe hack attack affected 38 million accounts | Security & Privacy - CNET NewsNews.cnet.com2014-05-23cite webhttp://www.zdnet.com/adobe-security-breach-actually-affected-closer-to-38-million-users-7000022560/Adobe security breach actually affected closer to 38 million usersZDNetThe company did not make it clear if all the personal information was encrypted, such as email addresses and physical addresses, though data privacy laws in 44 states require this information to be encrypted.cite webhttp://en.kioskea.net/news/24146-adobe-cyber-attack-was-a-lesson-for-corporationsAdobe Cyber Attack was a Lesson for Corporations - Kioskea.net2013-10-292014-05-23cite newshttp://www.forbes.com/sites/alexkonrad/2013/10/09/how-safe-is-encrypted-card-data-adobe/After Security Breach Exposes 2.9 Million Adobe Users, How Safe Is Encrypted Credit Card Data?Forbes2014-05-23AlexKonrad

A 3.8 GB file stolen from Adobe and containing 152 million usernames, reversibly encrypted passwords and unencrypted password hints was posted on AnonNews.org.cite webGoodinDanhttp://arstechnica.com/security/2013/11/how-an-epic-blunder-by-adobe-could-strengthen-hand-of-password-crackers/How an epic blunder by Adobe could strengthen hand of password crackers | Ars TechnicaArstechnica.com2013-11-012014-05-23LastPass, a password security firm, said that Adobe failed to use best practices for securing the passwords and has notSalt (cryptography)saltedthem.cite newsFinkleJimhttp://uk.reuters.com/article/2013/11/07/us-adobe-cyberattack-idUKBRE9A61D220131107Trove of Adobe user data found on Web after breach: security firm | ReutersUk.reuters.com2013-11-072014-05-23cite webhttp://www.csoonline.com/article/742570/adobe-confirms-stolen-passwords-were-encrypted-not-hashedAdobe confirms stolen passwords were encrypted, not hashed - CSO OnlineAnother security firm,Sophos, showed that Adobe used a weak encryption method permitting the recovery of a lot of information with very little effort.cite webPublished on 5th November 2013 by Gareth Halfacreehttp://www.bit-tech.net/news/bits/2013/11/05/adobe-breach-2/1Adobe data breach far worse than first claimedbit-tech.net2013-11-052014-05-23According to anInformation technologyITexpert, Adobe has failed its customers and should hang their heads in shame.cite webSmithMatthttp://business-technology.co.uk/2013/11/adobe-should-hang-their-heads-in-shame-following-cyber-attack/Adobe 'should hang their heads in shame' following cyber attackBusiness Technology2013-11-052014-05-23

Many of the credit cards were tied to theCreative Cloudsoftware-by-subscription service.cite webhttp://www.computerworld.com/s/article/9243010/Adobe_hack_shows_subscription_software_vendors_lucrative_targets?pageNumberAdobe hack shows subscription software vendors lucrative targets {{!}} ComputerworldAdobe offered its affected US customers a free membership in a credit monitoring service, but no similar arrangements have been made for non-US customers.cite webhttp://www.lifehacker.com.au/2013/10/massive-adobe-security-breach-change-your-passwords-now/Massive Adobe Security Breach: Change Your Passwords Now {{!}} Lifehacker Australiacite webhttp://www.gizmodo.com.au/2013/10/adobe-treating-australians-as-lesser-beings-even-after-details-of-2-9-million-accounts-were-stolen/Adobe Treating Australians As Lesser Beings Even After Details Of 2.9 Million Accounts Were Stolen {{!}} Gizmodo AustraliaWhen adata breachoccurs in the US, penalties depend on the state where the victim resides, not where the company is based.cite newshttp://uk.reuters.com/article/2013/11/25/us-adobe-cyberattack-idUKBRE9AO10R20131125Adobe says breach notification taking longer than anticipated | ReutersNovember 25, 2013

After stealing the customers' data, cyber-thieves also accessed Adobe'ssource coderepository, likely in mid-August 2013.cite webhttp://www.infoworld.com/t/application-security/adobe-fesses-hack-fudges-details-228189Adobe fesses up to hack but fudges on details {{!}} Application security - InfoWorldBecauseHacker (computer security)hackersacquired copies of the source code of Adobeproprietary softwareproprietaryproducts,cite newshttp://www.huffingtonpost.com/2013/10/04/adobe-hacked_n_4042351.htmlBBC Adobe Hacked: Cyber-Thieves Accessed Credit Card Information Of Nearly 3 Million CustomersHuffington PostOctober 4, 2013they could find and exploit any potential weaknesses in its security, computer experts warned.cite newshttp://www.nytimes.com/2013/10/04/technology/adobe-announces-security-breach.html?_rAdobe Announces Security Breach {{!}} The New York TimesDavidKocieniewskiOctober 3, 2013Security researcher Alex Holden, chief information security officer of Hold Security, characterized this Adobe breach, which affectedAdobe AcrobatAcrobat,ColdFusionand numerous other applications, as "one of the worst in US history".cite webhttp://gigaom.com/2013/10/07/ruh-roh-adobe-breach-is-just-the-beginning-researcher-says/Ruh-roh: Adobe breach is just the beginning, researcher saysGigaom.com2013-10-072014-05-23Adobe also announced that hackers stole parts of the source code ofPhotoshop, which according to commentators could allow programmers to copy its engineering techniquescite newshttp://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-24740873BBC News - Adobe hack: At least 38 million accounts breachedBbc.co.uk2013-10-302014-05-23and would make it easier to pirate Adobe's expensive products.cite newshttp://www.huffingtonpost.com/adam-levin/why-the-adobe-hack-scares_b_4277064.htmlWhy the Adobe Hack Scares Me - And Why It Should Scare You | Adam LevinHuffingtonpost.com2013-11-152014-05-23

Published on a server of a Russian-speakinghacker group,cite webhttp://www.pcworld.com/article/2054160/adobes-source-code-was-parked-on-hackers-unprotected-server.htmlAdobe's source code was parked on hackers' unprotected server {{!}} PCWorldthe "disclosure of encryption algorithms, other security schemes, and software vulnerabilities can be used to bypass protections for individual and corporate data" and may have opened the gateway to new generationzero-day attacks. Hackers already used ColdFusion exploits to make off with usernames and encrypted passwords ofPR Newswire's customers, which has been tied to the Adobe security breach.Citation neededAugust 2014They also used a ColdFusion exploit to breach Washington state court and expose up to 160,000 Social Security numbers.cite webhttp://www.zdnet.com/hackers-breached-washington-state-court-with-adobe-coldfusion-flaw-7000015199/Hackers breached Washington state court with Adobe ColdFusion flaw {{!}} ZDNet
